Posted By: Gomorrah (4/24/2010 6:56:08 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
A beautiful card.  
If they remove it in response to the etb trigger you keep your hand! Beautiful design to allow this.  
And if they remove it later via exile, it isnt bound to entering the graveyard to refresh your hand.  
Drawbacks being if they take it and sac it, or remove the counters. But he's such a beast for the cmc its worth it in my book.
posts.html:
A beautiful card.
